remarks: The extension of a permutation, fixing the additional element, is a 1-1 function.  (Contributed by AV, 6-Jan-2019.)
statement:
symgext.s $e |- S = ( Base ` ( SymGrp ` ( N \ { K } ) ) ) $.
symgext.e $e |- E = ( x e. N |-> if ( x = K , K , ( Z ` x ) ) ) $.
symgextf1 $p |- ( ( K e. N /\ Z e. S ) -> E : N -1-1-> N ) $.
$d K x $.
$d N x $.
$d S x $.
$d Z x $.
